name: null-class
description: A `Null` class to simplify `Object.create(null)` and `class extends null {}` patterns.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm test
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default Null;'>>esm/index.js
scripts.test: node -e 'var Null=require(`./cjs`);if(Null instanceof Function||new Null instanceof Object)throw `error`'

author: Andrea Giammarchi
